categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars Galaxies

nodes.text: Tull Toma was a male Gungan who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Dialogue pertaining to Tull Toma appeared in the directory tree files for the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided. However, he never actually appeared on the video game's live servers as a proper non-player character.
